TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:
> 
> Control surface power has been reduced but have not uoloaded new update yet. 
> Look in the cfg for the ine piece.
> 
> Its quite simple. Look for lifting surface entry. 
> 
> Also I have a patch on page one for people to test with better flying characteristics. Compare this cfg to the normal one in the mod , have a play around with it.
> 
> Aero has not been midified.
> 
> Are you using FAR?
> 
> Also as I stated a while back I have a stock FAR version coming. I already have it with RO but is incomplete. Wings are seperate.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I might sound bias but it flies very well in my game. If I have to then I will take off the wings. But I did like the idea of one piece.
> 
> I guess with wings seperate it can be FAR-able and wont need seperate version

Im not using far. It flys very well but is touchy. For me it can be sent into a flap spin pretty easily by nosing up when im coming in to land after re entry. in older versions it used all body lift. And it would fly backwards. I updated today and now its all standard lift. So i wasnt sure if you changed something. im using the one piece in the screen shot.

I might suggest anyone who has a shuttle in space that you land it before the next update is installed because your wings will dissapear, and landing will be tricky lol.

Unless there are votes to keep the one piece and just have a seperate download for the new seperate wing shuttle?

Reason being it is causing issues with getting the best aero potential.

I will do my best to make it stable before I release the update so we dont have multiple fix releases. 

I will be using jeasts work to start from and work from there.

I for one was originally skeptical of the one piece model when you first introduced it but I now absolutely love it. I think you should keep it but if a lot of other people don't want it or if it's too much trouble then getting rid of it isn't that big of a deal I guess.

Theyre functional. Just not the magnet bit yet. Possibly working in the JEM arm and it's camera. But I havent tested it

ok to keep things simple for now, the next updates will be the same BUT will have the extra wingless fuselage, and the extra 2 wings.

this way both versions can be tested AND it wont break your game if you install it.

almost finished with it now.

FAR configs ready in a test state also, and can be installed if you have FAR
also will fix the rcs

anyone willing to test the new stock game separate wing design, all new aero.

fixed tail control surface, as well as thing like parachutes and attempted the rcs fix.

out of time tonight

this download includes a folder called 'parts' and this overwrites the parts folder in your gamedata/space\_shuttle/ folder.

the only negative effect to your current setup is it may rotate your tail flap on any active shuttle and your saved crafts.

it mainly adds a couple of new parts.

[https://www.dropbox.com/s/7yceeegoq096sxb/Parts.zip?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/7yceeegoq096sxb/Parts.zip?dl=0)

The tail piece for the separate wing shuttle is too small. The separate winged shuttle flys much better than the one piece as is. In fact, it flys too well. It needs less lift. It dosnt fly like a brick. ![agIpPwg.png](http://i.imgur.com/agIpPwg.png)

Com Col are out of align. Thats why it pitches up really hard and is unpredictable at times. ![JmeHDas.png](http://i.imgur.com/JmeHDas.png)
